basic.description: An overview of aquatic toxicology. Topics include pharmacokinetics; mechanisms of toxicity; factors modifying exposure and effects; ecological effects of toxicity; and methods of toxicity testing, bio-monitoring, risk assessment and risk management. The course includes lectures, student seminars and visiting speakers. Three term hours; fall. Not offered 2010-2011.
basic.subject: BIOL
basic.title: Aquatic Toxicology
